show_type.label: Show content
show_type.info: You need to add two or more markets for the 'country/region selector' to work. To add markets, go to market settings. You also need to add two or more languages in market-language management for the selector to function. To add languages, visit language settings, and after adding, go to market-language management to set up multilingual support for the current market [overview](https://help.shopline.com/hc/en-001/articles/27936284578585-Markets-Management-Overview)

title_pattern.label: Trigger menu
title_pattern.info: Enter your first-level menu name, which will take effect when you have a dropdown

title.label: Menu title
title.info: This menu will be displayed behind main menu

show_locale_picker.label: Display Language selector
show_locale_picker.info: You need to go to 'Market' > 'Language management' and add at least two languages for the selector to take effect. To add a language, go to ['Language settings'](/admin/settings/lang), and after adding is complete, go to ['Market'](/admin/settings/markets) > 'Language management' and add the language of the current market.

show_country_picker.label: Display country/region selector
show_country_picker.info: Add at least two markets for this to take effect. To add a country/region, go to [Market settings](/admin/settings/markets)

transparent_header_logo_image.label: Transparent header Logo
transparent_header_logo_image.info: To achieve the best visual presentation, turn on the transparent header and upload an image in [Theme > Logo](/editor?locator=settings&category=logo)

hover_type.label: Hover over product media or the add-to-cart button to trigger a change when clicked
hover_type.info: Enable 'Popup product card overlay' in 'Theme settings - product card' to trigger the product card overlay when an item is added to the cart. The effect will disappear after the item is added. When enabled, ensure that the overlay content (e.g., Variants selector) fades in. Hovering over the product will also trigger an update to the product card overlay.

hover_on_mobile.label: Mobile persistent overlay
hover_on_mobile.info: Once enabled, the overlay will stay visible on mobile and wonâ€™t fade in or out when you click the add-to-cart button or hover over it.

add_to_cart_path.label: Add-to-cart flow
add_to_cart_path.info: When 'Pop-up product card overlay' is selected, ensure each product card has 'Overlay trigger display' enabled. If not, the selected SKU will be added directly to the cart. If both the overlay and product info have a variants selector, the SKU selected in the overlay will take priority. If 'Pop-up add-to-cart' is chosen, the SKU selected in the popup will be added to the cart.

group_header_1.label: Product card discount tag
group_header_1.info: This only affects the promotion tag. You can set the tag display on the product details page in Product details > Price.
